introduction: I am a Junior Software Engineer based in Cebu, Philippines. I always had this urge to build things. Nowadays I use this to create web services, appplications, and machine learning models.
hobbies: When I'm not busy developing I like to pass the time having a hit around the competitive scene of fighting games, Tekken specifically, and the captivating world of Monster Hunter. I also like to dabble in cinematography as much as I can. Oh and Star Wars, kudos to the writers of the Knights of the Old Republic series for pulling me back in.
